email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: A plate of festive cookies on a Christmas table
image.title: Merry Christmas!

email.text:
Hi everyone!
Congratulations for getting through this wild term!
On behalf of the DoCSoc committee I would like to wish everyone Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
We invite you to complete this wellbeing survey to help the Department improve the student support services: https://bit.ly/34oRIcW
Get some well-deserved rest over the break and we'll see you in a couple weeks at our 2021 events!
